actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to increase the percent of appropriations under the Adult Education Act which is available for allotment among Guam, American Samoa, the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands, and the Virgin Islands.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Amends the Adult Education Act to increase the funds available for Guam, American Samoa, the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands, and the Virgin Islands.

titles.title: A bill to increase the percent of appropriations under the Adult Education Act which is available for allotment among Guam, American Samoa, the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands, and the Virgin Islands.
